column2: "Thanks to you, we've secured the safety of the Valentine's venue for now!"
"So, next on the list... I want to deal with everyone's Valentine's worries!"
"From what I've been hearing, a lot of people just can't get their heads around what you're supposed to do on Valentine's Day."
"As a Hero, I think it's my duty to help people like that."
"So let's split up and go listen to people's troubles! Thanks in advance!"
